content: {"name": "Mount Pleasant Development Corporation Food Pantry  ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- They are opened on the first of the month between 10:30 every month regardless of the day, \n- Asked to call 211 to confirm if the church is in your location.\n- Instructions: RIng the bell on the main door, and someone let you in to administration department.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.mpdcorp.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6000 Radecke Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Baltimore", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21206", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.3323976, "longitude": -76.5302316}, "phones": [{"number": "(410) 325-3080", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers and Clothes upon availability"}]}
